name: SLRequest
desc: An object that you use to assemble an HTTP request for communicating with a social media service.

items.name: init!(forServiceType: String!, requestMethod: SLRequestMethod, url: URL!, parameters: [AnyHashable : Any]!)
items.desc: Initializes a newly created request object with the specified properties.

items.name: func perform(handler: SLRequestHandler!)
items.desc: Performs an asynchronous request and calls the specified handler when done.

items.name: typealias SLRequestHandler
items.desc: The callback handler for a request.

items.name: var account: ACAccount!
items.desc: Account information used to authenticate the request.

items.name: func preparedURLRequest() -> URLRequest!
items.desc: Returns an authorized URL request that can be sent using an NSURLConnection object.

items.name: var requestMethod: SLRequestMethod
items.desc: The method to use for this request.

items.name: enum SLRequestMethod
items.desc: Indicates the request method used in the request.

items.name: var url: URL!
items.desc: The destination URL for this request.

items.name: func addMultipartData(Data!, withName: String!, type: String!, filename: String!)
items.desc: Specifies a named multipart POST body for this request.
